Package io.jans.casa.plugins.authnmethod.service

Class SGService

java.lang.Object
io.jans.casa.plugins.authnmethod.service.FidoService
io.jans.casa.plugins.authnmethod.service.SGService
@Named @ApplicationScoped public class SGService extends FidoService
An app. scoped bean that encapsulates logic needed to enroll supergluu devices

    • generateRequest

      public String generateRequest(String userName, String code, String remoteIp)
      Builds a string that encodes information in order to display a QR code
      Parameters:
      userName - Username string
      code - An enrollment code associated to the user
      remoteIp - An IP address to encode in the request (possibly null)
      Returns:
      A string encoded in JSon format with the information for QR code display

    • getLatestSuperGluuDevice

      public SuperGluuDevice getLatestSuperGluuDevice(String userInum, String rpId)
      Returns the most recently added (with respect to the timestamp passed) Super Gluu device for the user in question
      Parameters:
      userId - The identifier (inum) of the user
      time - Timestamp (milliseconds from the "epoch")
      Returns:
      A SuperGluuDevice object or null if no device could be found. Device has to have counter=-1 and no displayName yet

    • isDeviceUnique

      public boolean isDeviceUnique(SuperGluuDevice dev, String userId) throws Exception
      Determines if the device passed is enrolled exactly once or more times
      Parameters:
      dev - A SuperGluuDevice instance
      userId - A reference to a user
      Returns:
      Boolean value indicating whether a device with this device's UUID is enrolled once for some user
      Throws:
      Exception - If the device is not even enrolled

      public String getPropertyValue(String key)
